creditline: Gift of Julia Meech in memory of Patricia Salmon
description: hanging scroll with image of standing woman in diamond-patterned kimono; she is looking to R with one arm folded and the other at her side holding a fan; flecks of gold leaf in TR; mounting is green silk with gold embroidered clouds and five embroidered swallows in margins; tan silk at T and B of mount; dark brown roller; natural wood box with lid and brown paper box carton
markings:
printed paper label on end of paper carton: 番號：二一五; 筆者：勝田哲先生; 圖題：美人
備考：  京都　横井　芦舟堂　謹製
medium: Ink, color, gold pigment, and gold leaf on silk
signed: BR, black ink, signed Tetsu-e with red seal
title: Beauty with fan on summer day
